#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: complexType CountryClub.
#sidebar TOCSchema

== Name ==

[CCountryClub CountryClub]
===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--CountryClub (restriction)
}}}
    
----
  	
===  Documentation ===

        
			A country-club is a place where we can find one or more golf courses at the same location.
			Examples are your municipal golf course, a 9 hole pitch and putt, a 36 or more hole golf courses,
			golf resorts, etc.
		
----
      
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
  	
===  Model ===

	<...>
            ( uid`*`, name, ownership-type?, address, contact`*`, amenety`*`, note`*`, media`*`, golf-course+, version`*`   )
  </...>
----
  		
=== Nested Elements ===

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* ||
|| address ||  					Address of the country club or golf course.				 || golfml:Address ||
|| amenety ||  Amenety available at the contry club || golfml:Amenety ||
|| contact ||  Contact for the golf course || golfml:Contact ||
|| golf-course ||  					Description of one golf course at the country club.				 || golfml:GolfCourse ||
|| media ||  Media for the country club || golfml:Media ||
|| name ||  					Name of the country club.				 || xs:string ||
|| note ||  					Note about the country club.				 || golfml:Note ||
|| ownership-type ||  					Name of the country club.				 || golfml:CountryClubTypeEnum ||
|| uid ||  					Unique identifier for an application.				 || golfml:UID ||
|| version ||   || golfml:Version ||
